function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Enabling the notification function of scopus to receive weekly publication updates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reviewing selected papers in detail and extracting necessary information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Broad search string may result in irrelevant articles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate categorization of articles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of relevant research due to narrow filtering","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on medical issues may divert attention from other aspects of pandemic management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities of cities to pandemics may not be fully understood","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of existing literature review on the impacts of the pandemic on cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of people in cities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited literature on cities and pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased frequency of pandemics due to climate change and human encroachment into wildlife habitats","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of discussion on socio-economic and institutional factors impacting resilience building potentials of smart solutions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate exploration of linkages between smart solutions and multiple resilience abilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited examination of whether deployment of smart solutions may detract from resilience abilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart city technologies may not be uniformly accessible, leading to inequitable distribution of benefits and access to pandemic response tools.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation spread through smart city platforms and technologies may exacerbate the spread of pandemics and hinder control efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on smart city technologies for pandemic response may lead to over-reliance and complacency in traditional public health measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart city infrastructure may lead to increased surveillance and potential invasion of privacy, which can lead to citizen resistance and civil liberties violations.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on smart solutions may lead to digital divide, excluding people and organizations with limited skills and access to technology from pandemic control measures and recovery efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of smart solutions without proper testing and regulation may lead to technological failures, security breaches, and unintended consequences, affecting the effectiveness of pandemic control measures and posing risks to public safety.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Teleworking may improve labor productivity through saving travel times.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart solutions such as telemedicine and teleworking may improve citizen satisfaction, enhancing social resilience.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting the use of inclusive smart solutions that raise awareness and create innovative platforms for engagement of all citizens in social activities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The reduction in bus ridership during the pandemic","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of mobility data potentially revealing links between mobility patterns and death/infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Teleworking and telemedicine improving air quality and reducing energy consumption","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on high internet connectivity for telemedicine and teleworking","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on smart city initiatives for pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on big data analytics for impact assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased privacy and safety concerns in telemedicine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on telemedicine as a substitute for all in-person clinic visits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for healthcare services in aging communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on teleworking may lead to reduced face-to-face interactions, impacting social connections and mental well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of certain career groups from teleworking may create disparities and inequalities in access to remote work opportunities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on telemedicine and remote healthcare services may lead to potential gaps in patient care and medical oversight.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital platforms and automation may lead to potential cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-reliance on teleworking and telemedicine may lead to social isolation and reduced physical interaction, impacting mental health and well-being of individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated automation in industrial activities may lead to job displacement and reduced employment opportunities for manual labor.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research period for assessing efficiency of hand-washing stations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in remote work leading to potential digital security risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of factories impacting long-term sustainability","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of key logistical equipment such as masks, face shields, gloves, and testing kits in hospitals","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid manufacturing of portable isolation units using 3-d printing technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for monitoring compliance with social distancing measures and detecting potentially infected individuals","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in supply chains due to travel restrictions and lack of key workers","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-risk face-to-face encounters due to supply chain disruptions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through telemedicine platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms for remote diagnosis and treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of smart technologies with telemedicine platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai-enabled technology dependency for diagnosis may lead to misdiagnosis or missed diagnoses due to technological errors or limitations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
